headline.main: Thomas Mann Dies at 80; Novelist Won Nobel Prize; Noted Writer in Tradition of Goethe and Heine Was Blunt Foe of Hitler Th o.ma s'Mann Is Dead in Zurich at801

snippet: ZURICH, Switzerland, Aug. 12 -- Thomas Mann, a modern literary giant, died in the Cantonal Hospital here early tonight. He was 80 years old. His death followed a thrombosis, or blood clot.
